llm.feedback: Rewrite each line as a single sentence, embed the magnitude and sign in the Driver/Mechanism field and map it to the canonical handle spx (e.g., “Up | 3–6 months | fed_policy | +1–3% spx upside if 25‑bp cut confirmed in September Fed minutes (XTQIQRP5K) | 45% (FAN5RYW6T)”), add citations for all numeric claims (July CPI 2.7% (FAN5RYW6T), top‑10 tech earnings beat expectations (FAN5RYW6T)), ensure the What to watch clause names a dated catalyst window (September Fed minutes, Q2 earnings releases, July CPI), and remove any extraneous clauses that break the single‑sentence rule.
